text: Robert La Follette may refer to: * Robert M. La Follette, Robert Marion "Fighting Bob" La Follette Sr. (1855–1925), an American politician **Robert M. La Follette House, Maple Bluff, Wisconsin, U.S. **Robert M. La Follette School of Public Affairs, University of Wisconsin–Madison, U.S. **Robert M. La Follette High School, Madison, Wisconsin, U.S. **Robert M. La Follette Sr. (Davidson), a statue * Robert M. La Follette Jr., Robert Marion "Young Bob" La Follette Jr. (1895–1953), an American politician, son of Robert Sr. ==See also== *La Follette (disambiguation)
title: Robert La Follette (disambiguation)
